title: Watch Face Store -Android Wear
description: The app will give you access to a number of beautiful and elegant watch faces for your Android Wear device.1. Download your favorite watch face from the app.2. Set the app as the watch face on your Android Wear.3. Sync the downloaded watch face to your Android Wear.More and more designs will be added from time to time. Also we have a lots of interesting features coming in to the app soon. So stay tuned for updates.Meanwhile do rate us if you liked the app.And send in your feedback, suggestions and complaints to support@espritpixels.com "Watch Faces for Android Wear"
descriptionHTML:
The app will give you access to a number of beautiful and elegant watch faces for your Android Wear device.

1. Download your favorite watch face from the app.

2. Set the app as the watch face on your Android Wear.

3. Sync the downloaded watch face to your Android Wear.

More and more designs will be added from time to time. Also we have a lots of interesting features coming in to the app soon. So stay tuned for updates.

Meanwhile do rate us if you liked the app.
And send in your feedback, suggestions and complaints to support@espritpixels.com

"Watch Faces for Android Wear"
